CPuzzleGraphModel.h

00001 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00002 /// @file         CPuzzleGraphModel.cpp
00003 ///
00004 /// @author       Bob Buehler, Matt Dissinger, Kyle Owen
00005 ///
00006 /// @compiler     Windows: MinGW / Linux: GNU G++
00007 ///
00008 /// @project      GNAT
00009 ///
00010 /// @description  This file contains the definition of the CPuzzleGraphModel
00011 ///               class which is a wrapper for the CPuzzleGraph class.  It is
00012 ///               designed to allow for notification of data modification by
00013 ///               requiring that all data modification be done through this
00014 ///               class.
00015 ///
00016 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00017 #ifndef _CPUZZLEGRAPHMODEL_H_
00018 #define _CPUZZLEGRAPHMODEL_H_
00019 
00020 #include "../CPuzzleGraph.h"
00021 #include "../../CStyleToolkit.h"
00022 #include <QObject>
00023 #include <QRect>
00024 
00025 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00026 /// CPuzzleGraphModel
00027 ///
00028 /// @description  The CPuzzleGraphModel class is a wrapper for the CPuzzleGraph.
00029 ///               It is created to allow QObjects to connect to and recieve
00030 ///               signals whenever any class has modified the underlying data.
00031 ///
00032 /// @limitations  The signals will only be emitted if the CPuzzleGraphModel is
00033 ///               used to edit. If it is bypassed and the CPuzzleGraph is
00034 ///               directly manipulated then there will be no signals sent.
00035 ///
00036 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00037 class CPuzzleGraphModel : public QObject
00038 {
00039     Q_OBJECT
00040 
00041 public:
00042     CPuzzleGraphModel( QObject *parent );
00043     ~CPuzzleGraphModel();
00044 
00045     void addEdge( int node1, int node2, bool bidirectional );
00046     void addNode(SPuzzleNode *node);
00047     void addSpan(SPuzzleSpan *span);
00048 
00049     void createNewData();
00050 
00051     void deleteNodeAt(int index);
00052     void deleteSpanAt(int index);
00053 
00054     void editNodeEndFlag(int index, bool flag);
00055     void editNodeName(int index, QString name);
00056     void editNodeHeuristic(int index, qreal value );
00057     void editNodePosition(int index, QPoint point);
00058     void editNodeStartFlag(int index, bool flag);
00059 
00060     void editSpanFlag       (int index, SPuzzleSpan::SpanFlag flag);
00061     void editSpanWeightFrom1(int index, qreal weight);
00062     void editSpanWeightFrom2(int index, qreal weight);
00063 
00064     void findEdge  (QPoint p, int &span, int &type) const;
00065     void findWeight(QPoint p, int &span, int &type) const;
00066 
00067     int findNode( QPoint p ) const;
00068     int findSpan( QPoint p ) const;
00069     int findSpan( int node1, int node2 ) const;
00070 
00071     QRect getContainingRect() const;
00072 
00073     SPuzzleNode * getStartNode() const;
00074     QList<SPuzzleNode *> getGoalNodeList() const;
00075 
00076     const SPuzzleNode * getNodeAt(int index) const;
00077     const SPuzzleSpan * getSpanAt(int index) const;
00078     int getNodeCount() const;
00079     int getSpanCount() const;
00080 
00081     void load( const QString &filename );
00082 
00083     int newNode();
00084     int newSpan( int node1, int node2 );
00085 
00086     void realignData();
00087 
00088     void save( const QString &filename ) const;
00089 
00090 private:
00091 
00092     bool testEdgeNormal(QPoint p, int index, int &type) const;
00093     bool testEdgeSplit (QPoint p, int index, int &type) const;
00094     bool testEdgeWeight(QPoint p, int index, int &type) const;
00095 
00096     void getPlaneEquation(float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2,
00097                           float &a, float &b, float &c) const;
00098 
00099     CPuzzleGraph   *m_data;
00100     CStyleToolkit  *m_style;
00101 
00102 signals:
00103     void changed();
00104 };
00105 
00106 #endif
